text: vatti vankuvatu avarkalukkut tatai ceyyappattiruntum, avarkal atai vanki vantatan (karanamakavum,) tavarana muraiyil avarkal makkalin cottukalai vilunkik kontiruntatan (karanamakavum, ivvaru tantanai valankinom), ivarkalil kahpiranorukku (marumaiyil) novinai ceyyum vetanaiyaiyum nam cittappatuttiyullom
